channel.title: ios on 酷卡派
channel.description: Recent content in ios on 酷卡派

item.title: cordova改wkwebview打包ios应用，直接启动不了
item.description: cordova改wkwebview打包ios应用，直接启动不了 cordova改为wkwebview后启动不了了，提示如下错误： *** Terminating app due to uncaught exception 'NSUnknownKeyException', reason: '[<WKWebViewConfiguration 0x11de16c30> setValue:forUndefinedKey:]: this class is not key value coding-compliant for the key _alwaysRunsAtForegroundPriority.' 百度大法找个各种方法都不管用，最后这样搞定的，原因不知道 NSString* str = @"X2Fsd2F5c1J1bnNBdEZvcmVncm91bmRQcmlvcml0eQ=="; 改为： NSString* str = @"YWx3YXlzUnVuc0F0Rm9yZWdyb3VuZFByaW9yaXR5";

item.title: Guideline 2.5.1 - Performance - Software Requirements
item.description: 提示如下： Your app uses the “prefs:root=” non-public URL scheme, which is a private entity. The use of non-public APIs is not permitted on the App Store because it can lead to a poor user experience should these APIs change. 查找prefs:root=,找到类似的代码如下： 1 [[UIApplication sharedApplication] openURL:[NSURL URLWithString:@"prefs:root=Privacy"]];//隐私设置 改为 1 [[UIApplication sharedApplication] openURL:[NSURL URLWithString:UIApplicationOpenSettingsURLString] options:@{} completionHandler:nil];
